about_the_game:
In a world where humanity teeters on the brink of extinction, No More Light plunges you into a post-apocalyptic nightmare swarming with grotesque insectoid monsters. As a lone survivor, you must navigate this hostile environment, scavenge for resources, and uncover the dark secrets behind the invasion. But survival is just the beginning—your journey will take you to the heart of humanity's struggle, where you’ll discover powers and abilities that will change the course of your fate.

With a deep narrative-driven campaign, No More Light challenges you to make life-or-death decisions as you uncover the mystery behind the invasion and fight to save what remains of the human race. Form uneasy alliances with fellow survivors and enigmatic beings who may not be entirely trustworthy.

Key Features:

  • Parasite Control: Harness a parasite technology to turn the tide of battle. With the Parasite Controller, you can take over the mind of an enemy via a parasitic worm, allowing you to infiltrate and sabotage their ranks from within. Turn your foes against each other and execute strategic takedowns as you exploit this powerful tool.

  • Metamorphosis: Unleash the full potential of your transformation as you undergo Metamorphosis—a gruesome process that fuses your human body with insectoid traits. This unique ability grants you devastating powers and enhances your combat capabilities, but it comes at a cost. Will you embrace the monstrous power within, or will you cling to your humanity?

  • Dynamic Weather: The weather is not just a backdrop—it’s a battlefield. Controlled by alien forces through captured HAARP stations, the weather changes dynamically, affecting visibility, movement, and strategy. Storms, fog, and other extreme conditions will challenge your survival, and reclaiming control of these stations will be key to turning the tide against the insect invaders.

  • Intense Survival Gameplay: Scavenge for weapons, resources, and gear to survive in a world where every shadow hides danger. Face relentless waves of insectoid creatures, each more terrifying than the last, as you fight to stay alive in a world where death is always one misstep away.

  • Deep Narrative Experience: Uncover the truth behind the alien invasion and the role of the mysterious Grays. Your choices will shape the outcome of your journey as you navigate the moral complexities of a world on the brink of annihilation.

  • Dynamic Combat System: Engage in visceral combat that combines traditional weaponry with the unique abilities granted by your Metamorphosis and Parasite Control. Adapt your tactics to different enemies and environments as you battle for survival.

  • Exploration and Discovery: Traverse a sprawling, desolate world filled with secrets, hidden locations, and alien technology. The deeper you explore, the more you’ll uncover about the mysterious forces at play.


    Prepare yourself for a brutal fight for survival, where every choice could mean the difference between life and death. In a world where hope is all but extinguished, will you be the light that guides humanity to victory, or will the darkness consume you?

content_descriptors.notes: Blood and Gore, and Strong Language

Thrown into a devastaded world, you'll navigate a post-apocalyptic landscape, scavenge for resources, and engage in intense combat against terrifying creatures..
